meanings.definition: A period of four years reckoned from one celebration of the Olympic Games to the next.
meanings.sent1: During the olympiad, many athletes train hard for the next Olympic Games.
meanings.sent2: The whole world comes together for the olympiad to celebrate sportsmanship.
meanings.sent3: At the olympiad, the turtles challenged the rabbits to a race!
meanings.sent4: Her journey felt like an olympiad, with obstacles and victories along the way.
meanings.sent5: The olympiad was a time of fierce competition and unity among nations.

meanings.definition: A celebration of the Olympic Games.
meanings.sent1: The olympiad was filled with cheers and excitement as athletes competed.
meanings.sent2: Families gathered to watch the opening ceremony of the olympiad.
meanings.sent3: The animals in the zoo organized their own olympiad with races and games.
meanings.sent4: The city transformed into a colorful spectacle during the olympiad.
meanings.sent5: Children waved flags and banners during the olympiad parade.
